subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The undrafted rookie Anthony Morrow had 37 points and 11 rebounds in his first N.B.A. start Saturday as the visiting Golden State beat the Los Angeles Clippers, 121-103.
snippet: The undrafted rookie Anthony Morrow had 37 points and 11 rebounds in his first N.B.A. start Saturday as the visiting Golden State beat the Los Angeles Clippers, 121-103.
